name: Dipak Mandal
aboutMe: I am Dipak Mandal, a front-end developer. I have hands-on experience in React, Context-API, Redux, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I am happy to say that I am a part of this project. I am a passionate and curious person who is always ready for new technologies and experiments and here I get a chance to show my skills.

name: Megha Maurya
aboutMe: I'm Megha Maurya, a Frontend Developer. I have in hands experience in React, React Native, Redux, HTML, CSS, and Javascript. I'm grateful that I'm a part of this project During this project, I learned a new framework Tailwind CSS, and Integration with backend APIs. I'm a passionate and curious person who is always ready to explore new technologies and experiment and here I get the chance to show my skills.

name: Nikhil Gangeri
aboutMe: Back End Developer who is passionate about learning new skills and technologies on a regular basis. Core believer of constant learning. Proactive and initiative-driven. Can work under less or almost zero supervision when allotted a task. Well-versed with technologies like MongoDB,  PostgreSQL, ExpressJS, Node JS, Docker, AWS, Git, NGINX, REDIS.
